content.rendered:
Directed by A.R. Murugadoss.

Written by A.R. Murugadoss. Karan Singh Rathore. Arun Shekhar.

Cast Sonakshi Sinha(Akira). Anurag Kashyap(ACP Rane). Konkona Sen Sharma(Rabia). Nandu Madhav(Rajeshwar). Amit Sadh(Siddharth). Atul Kulkarni(Akira’s Father). Smita Jaykar(Akira’s Mother). Lokesh Gupte(Manik). Uday Sabnis(Baapu Rao). Raai Laxmi(Maya). Chaitannya Choudhry(Ajay (as Chaitanya Choudhury)). Ankita Bhargava Patel(Shilpa (as Ankita Bhargava)). Ashish Ghosh(Principal). Krishna Bhatt(David). Aparna Ghoshal(Sister D’Mello). Urmila Mahanta(Anna). Teena Singh(Nikki). Kajol Saroj(Rani). Mishika Arora(Akira Jr. (as Mishiekka Arora)). Taher Penwala(Ajay Jr.). Sanjay Sahani(Rogue 1). Chinmay Jadhavrao(Rogue 2 (as Chinmay Jadhav)). Phalguni Khanna(Acid Attack Victim). Manish Kumar(Goon 1). Naresh Morwal(Goon 2). Sanjay Mishra(Goon 3). Vinay(Village Inspector). Navin Borana(Acid Attack Victim’s Father). Durga(Acid Attack Victim’s Mother). Mukesh Hariawala(Village Principal (as Dr. Mukesh Hariawala)). Priyanka Vaghani(Ipod Girl) . Kirti Adarkar(Professor). Khushboo Atre(Mental patient). Lankesh Bhardwaj(Cab driver). Shyam Bhimsaria(Drunkard).Sarika Degawkar. Ashish Dixit(Vishal). Saurabh Goyal(Sunil).Tejashree Jadhav. Deepak Karanjiker(Police Commisioner). Tanuka Laghate(NGO Volunteer).Chirag Patil. Swapnil Raut(Collage gang). Abhimanyu Sarkar(College villan). Vishal Saroye(Mohan). Jatin Suryavanshi(Police). Priyanka Thimmesh((as Priyanka)). Arun Verma(Mental Hospital doctor)

Language Hindi.

Producers Armit Chhabra. A.R. Murugadoss. Sheel Nimbalkar.

Production Fox STAR Studios.
